snippet.title: Banjo Kazooie 4: Quest for Kurkoins
snippet.description:
#BanjoKazooie #N64 #Nintendo64
About this project: 
This project started as a big contest on my Twitch channel, on 2021. In each phase of the contest, a winner and a second winner were chosen. The first winner would design the main area of a world, and the second winner a sub-area, up to a total of 6 worlds. Until now the first 5 worlds have been published separately, under the name of Banjo Kazooie: Kurkoin Quest. The idea was to release those 6 worlds with a small Hub World, and that's it. However, now the project grew up, and the full version will be published under the name of Banjo Kazooie 4: Quest for Kurkoins, and will include all the previous worlds (plus added content) + the sixth world + Hub World + Story. More info coming soon, stay tuned!

Music by Riposte: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6onxGJJ_n_aKYumEU1Wycw/videos

Visit the NEW Hackpack Discord for more BK modding stuff
https://discord.gg/Cm2JuQvewN

SUPPORT
https://www.patreon.com/Kurko 
https://www.paypal.me/KurkoMods
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/kurko_mods
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Markus_Kurko 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/Kurko_mods/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@kurko_mods

KURKO MODS PROJECTS:
-BANJO KAZOOIE - NOSTALGIA 64 (WIP)
https://youtu.be/0kRufHRidY4
-BANJO KAZOOIE - QUEST FOR KURKOINS (2022-2023 WIP)
1-Snacker's Coral Bay (2022) https://youtu.be/5CJWoLUeEk0
2-Frost Woods (2022) https://youtu.be/kaU-lBH28po
3-Splash Mountain (2022) https://youtu.be/7mo3IZXj01o
4-Gruntylvania (2022) https://youtu.be/U-rfqpcbqlA
5-Kiddy Kingdom (2023) https://youtu.be/5_4za7uk0ZY
-BANJO KAZOOIE - SNOWGLOW VILLAGE REMAKE (2022)
https://youtu.be/kkt5UVne4gY
-BANJO KAZOOIE - HOW THE GRUNTCH STOLE CHRISTMAS (2021)
https://youtu.be/SIZgKilqkQM
-BANJO KAZOOIE - NIGHTBEAR BEFORE CHRISTMAS (2020)
https://youtu.be/jXRfuXqnW5Q
-THE LEGEND OF BANJO KAZOOIE: THE JIGGIES OF TIME (2020)
https://youtu.be/gAvlDL5HG9c
-THE LEGEND OF BANJO KAZOOIE: GRUNTILDA'S MASK (2019)
https://youtu.be/Z7dQWmg7kGs
-BANJO KAZOOIE in HYRULE TEMPLE (From Smash Bros series) Playable Mod (2019)
https://youtu.be/sVOSwG6XU9U
-THE LEGEND OF BANJO KAZOOIE - THE BEAR WAKER (2019)
https://youtu.be/PyA00Lpix20
-BANJO KAZOOIE x DONKEY KONG COUNTRY (2019)
https://youtu.be/5v2IbWkuMGg
-A VIDEOTUTORIAL EXPLAINING HOW TO MAKE THEM WORK!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2MZ00NXw07I
